00059 void PrintMenu::report(int refreshFlag) {
00060     int tab1=REPORT_X1+110;
00061     int tab2=REPORT_X1+240;
00062     int vtab1=REPORT_Y1+10;
00063     int vtab2=REPORT_Y1+50;
00064     int vtab3=REPORT_Y1+90;
00065     int vtab4=REPORT_Y1+300;
00066 
00067     vga.use_back();
00068 
00069     if (refreshFlag == INFO_REPAINT) {
00070         if(init_flag )
00071             deinit();
00072 
00073         //------------- paint the background ----------------//
00074         if (!init_flag) {
00075             option_label[0]="";
00076             option_label[1]="";
00077             option_label[2]="";
00078             option_label[3]="";
00079 
00080             print_option=1;
00081             user_interface.bg_img(BG_PIC_ID, &vga_back);
00082             info.disp_column_bitmap(&vga_back);
00083             init_flag = 1;
00084             font_hstone.put(tab2+40,vtab1,"PRINT MENU");
00085 
00086             if((print_view_mode==MODE_STUDENT_REPORT)||
00087                (print_view_mode==MODE_FACULTY_SUMMARY)||
00088                (print_view_mode==MODE_COURSE_REPORT)
00089                 ) {
00090                 //                              font_hstone.put(tab2-100,vtab2,"Student Report");
00091                 option_label[0]="Current Screen";
00092                 // ###### begin Gilbert 05/06/2001 ######//
00093                 // option_label[1]="Departmental Report (Current Departments)";
00094                 option_label[1]="Departmental Report (Current Department)";
00095                 // ###### end Gilbert 05/06/2001 ######//
00096                 option_label[2]="Departmental Report (All Departments)";
00097                 option_label[3]="Institutional Report";
00098             }
00099 
00100             if(
00101                 (print_view_mode==MODE_SCENARIO_LETTER)||
00102                 (print_view_mode==MODE_SCEN_WELCOME_LETTER)||
00103                 (print_view_mode==MODE_WELCOME_LETTER)||
00104                 (print_view_mode==MODE_EVALUATION_LETTER)
00105                 ) {
00106                 if((info.year_passed<=1)
00107                    &&(player_school.scenario_id==0)) {
00108                     option_label[0]="Welcome Letter";
00109                     option_label[1]="";
00110                     option_label[2]="";
00111                     option_label[3]="";
00112                 }
00113                 else {
00114                     option_label[0]="Welcome Letter";
00115                     option_label[1]="Evaluation Letter";
00116                     option_label[2]="Both";
00117                     option_label[3]="";
00118                 }
00119             }
00120 
00121             if(print_view_mode==MODE_BLACKBOARD_LOG) {
00122                 option_label[0]="News and Messages";
00123                 option_label[1]="Objectives";
00124                 option_label[2]="Both";
00125                 option_label[3]="";
00126             }
00127 
00128             if((print_view_mode==MODE_SCORE_REPORT)) {
00129                 option_label[0]="Current Screen";
00130                 option_label[1]="All Reports";
00131                 option_label[2]="";
00132                 option_label[3]="";
00133             }
00134 
00135             if((print_view_mode==MODE_FINANCIAL_REPORT)) {
00136                 option_label[0]="Current Screen";
00137                 option_label[1]="All Reports";
00138                 option_label[2]="All Reports (Expanded)";
00139                 option_label[3]="";
00140             }
00141 
00142             if(print_view_mode==MODE_PERFORMANCE_REPORT) {
00143                 option_label[0]="Current Screen";
00144                 option_label[1]="Summary Report";
00145                 // ##### begin Gilbert 05/06/2001 ######//
00146                 // option_label[2]="Departmental Report (Current Departments)";
00147                 option_label[2]="Departmental Report (Current Department)";
00148                 // ##### end Gilbert 05/06/2001 ######//
00149                 option_label[3]="Departmental Report (All Departments)";
00150             }
00151 
00152             if( print_view_mode >= MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM &&
00153                 print_view_mode <= MODE_LAST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM ) {
00154 
00155                 switch( FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM_ID + print_view_mode - MODE_FIRST_NONDEPARTMENTAL_FIRM ) {
00156                 case FIRM_ADMISSIONS:
00157                 case FIRM_STADIUM:
00158                 case FIRM_PLAY_FIELD:
00159                 case FIRM_INDOOR_SPORTS:
00160                 case FIRM_DEVELOPMENT:
00161                 case FIRM_FACILITIES:
00162                 case FIRM_LIBRARY:
00163                 case FIRM_OLD_MAIN: {
00164                     option_label[0]="Current Screen";
00165                     option_label[1]="All Reports";
00166                     option_label[2]="";
00167                     option_label[3]="";
00168                 }
00169                 break;
00170                 case FIRM_PARK_LOTS:
00171                 case FIRM_PARK_STRUCTURE:
00172                 case FIRM_POLICE: {
00173                     option_label[0]="All Reports";
00174                     option_label[1]="";
00175                     option_label[2]="";
00176                     option_label[3]="";
00177                 }
00178                 break;
00179 
00180                 }
00181             }
00182 
00183             if(in_print_mode)
00184                 for(int j=0;j<4;j++) {
00185                     if(option_label[j].len()>0)
00186                         image_interface.put_back(tab1,vtab3+j*40-5,(j==(print_option-1))?"PRTMENUT":"PRTMENUO");
00187                     font_stone.put(tab1+70,vtab3+j*40,option_label[j].str_buf);
00188                 }
00189             font_stone.put(tab1+120,vtab4,"Ok");
00190             font_stone.put(tab1+360,vtab4,"Cancel");
00191         }
00192     }
00193 
00194     //------- blt the back buffer to front buffer -------//
00195     in_print_mode=1;
00196     vga.blt_buf(ZOOM_X1, ZOOM_Y1, ZOOM_X2, ZOOM_Y2);
00197 
00198 };

00200 int PrintMenu::detect() {
00201     int tab1=REPORT_X1+110;
00202     int tab2=REPORT_X1+210;
00203     int vtab1=REPORT_Y1+10;
00204     int vtab2=REPORT_Y1+50;
00205     int vtab3=REPORT_Y1+90;
00206     int vtab4=REPORT_Y1+300;
00207     int j;
00208     /*
00209       for(j=0;j<4;j++)
00210       {
00211       if(mouse.in_area(tab1+70,vtab3+j*40,tab1+670,vtab3+(j+1)*40))
00212       {
00213       for(int i=0;i<4;i++)
00214       font_stone.put(tab1+70,vtab3+i*40,print_menu_labels[i]);
00215       font_hstone.put
00216       (tab1+70,vtab3+j*40,print_menu_labels[j]);
00217       }
00218       }
00219     */
00220     if(mouse.single_click(tab1+120,vtab4,tab1+170,vtab4+30)) {
00221         font_hstone.put(tab1+120,vtab4,"Ok");
00222         font_stone.put(tab1+360,vtab4,"Cancel");
00223         printing();
00224         sys.set_staying_view_mode(0);
00225         sys.set_view_mode(MODE_NORMAL);
00226     }
00227 
00228     if(mouse.single_click(tab1+360,vtab4,tab1+420,vtab4+30)) {
00229         font_stone.put(tab1+120,vtab4,"Ok");
00230         font_hstone.put(tab1+360,vtab4,"Cancel");
00231 
00232         if( (print_menu.print_view_mode==MODE_WELCOME_LETTER)
00233             ||  (print_menu.print_view_mode==MODE_EVALUATION_LETTER)
00234             ||  (print_menu.print_view_mode==MODE_SCEN_WELCOME_LETTER)
00235             ||  (print_menu.print_view_mode==MODE_SCENARIO_LETTER))
00236             sys.set_view_mode(sys.save_view_mode);
00237         else
00238             sys.set_staying_view_mode(0);
00239     }
00240 
00241     if(in_print_mode) {
00242         for(j=0;j<4;j++) {
00243             font_stone.put(tab1+70,vtab3+j*40,option_label[j].str_buf);
00244 
00245             if(mouse.single_click(tab1,vtab3+j*40,tab1+400,vtab3+j*40+33)) {
00246                 print_option=j+1;
00247             }
00248         }
00249 
00250         if(print_option>0) {
00251             for(j=0;j<4;j++) {
00252                 if(option_label[j].len()>0)
00253                     image_interface.put_back(tab1,vtab3+j*40-5,(j==(print_option-1))?"PRTMENUT":"PRTMENUO");
00254                 if(print_option==j+1)
00255                     font_hstone.put(tab1+70,vtab3+j*40,option_label[j].str_buf);
00256             }
00257         }
00258     }
00259 
00260     return 0;
00261 };

00263 void PrintMenu::printing() {
00264     // change font for printing
00265     font_chartsm.init("CHRP", 1);
00266     font_chart_red_sm.init("RCSP", 1);
00267     font_chart_green_sm.init("GCSP", 1);
00268     font_chart_blue_sm.init("BCSP", 1);
00269 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00270     font_chart_purple_sm.init("PCSP", 1);
00271 #endif
00272 
00273     printing1();
00274     printing2();
00275     printing3();
00276     printing4();
00277     printing5();
00278     printing6();
00279     printing7();
00280     in_print_mode=0;
00281 
00282     // restore font for printing
00283     font_chartsm.init("CHRM", 1);
00284     font_chart_red_sm.init("RCSM", 1);
00285     font_chart_green_sm.init("GCSM", 1);
00286     font_chart_blue_sm.init("BCSM", 1);
00287 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00288     font_chart_purple_sm.init("PCSM", 1);
00289 #endif
00290 };
